thread.title: Ground News - Lenox Square announces new partnership with APD for shopper safety
thread.title_full: Ground News - Lenox Square announces new partnership with APD for shopper safety

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Lenox Square announces new partnership with APD for shopper safety
text:
Summary by Ground News The mall has joined the Connect Atlanta program, which allows anyone to register their security cameras with the Atlanta Police Department. The new partnership will allow the APD to have full access to the mall's security cameras. Officials say the mall will also be monitored by at least 18 off-duty Atlanta police officers and more than a dozen private security officers. Share menu More
